text: Izithunywa zabo zathi, “Ngakube kukhona yini ukungabaza ngoMvelinqangi umsunguli wamazulu nomhlaba na? Uyanimema ukuze anithethelele ezonweni zenu bese eninika ithuba kuze kube isikhathi esinqunyiwe” bathi (ezithunyweni) aniyilutho ngaphandle kokuthi ningabantu njengathi nifuna ukusivimba kulokho okwakukhonzwa ngobaba bethu na? Ngakho-ke siletheleni igunya elicacile
